bill.title: "Truth in Grading Act"; create to require school districts to adopt a uniform grading policy.
bill.description: An Act To Create The "truth In Grading Act"; To Require The School Board Of Each Local School District To Adopt A Uniform Grading Policy Before Each School Year; To Prescribe The Criteria For The Grading Policy Adopted By The School Board; To Require The School Board To Require The Uniform Grading Policy To Apply To Both Elementary And Secondary Schools In The District And To Adopt Appropriate Equivalents That Are Representative Of The Age And Grade Level Curriculum Of The Students To Whom The Grading Policy Applies; To Provide That It Shall Be A Felony For Failing To Adopt A Uniform Grading Policy; And For Related Purposes.
